forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 3pm. Mostly sunny. High near 18, with temperatures falling to around 16 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 11, with temperatures rising to around 16 overnight. West wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lots of snow ! Yesterday’s big groomer provided a firm flat skate deck . Today nature provided about 2 inches of fluff . Has to push a little bit , but it was very nice - and the sun came out . LF 7

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: This is the official report from Huron Meadows YESTERDAY: "Bucks Run is open for classic and skate skiing as of yesterday December 13, 2025.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.  Bucks Run will be closed on Monday, December 15 and Tuesday December 16, 2025 until 2 pm so that our staff can continue to spread additional snow.The golf course trails, Coyote Run and Hawk Hills, along with Cedar Trace were groomed for skate ski only on December 11, 2025 as there is not enough snow throughout the trails to groom for classic tracks.  Classic skiers are still welcome to ski, just note there are no tracks set.  No additional grooming has taken place in other areas of the park.  These trails are open during normal park hours, weather and conditions permitting.*No other update from the park as of 9:30am this morning.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Groomed and tracked. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold start to the ski day but the wind is light and the temperature is forecast to rise quickly today with a high around 24 degrees. A few inches of snow fell at Nub's this morning. Expect some light snow sitting on top of the corduroy which should make for great skiing. NASTAR racing today from 12:30 to 2:30 p.m. on Birch Run. The soups of the day is cream of potato and ham. Over 40 runs are now open at Nub's! Pintail Peak will open before next weekend! Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
